quote: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire.
author: Goku

quote: I'd rather trust and regret than doubt and regret.
author: Kirito

quote: You're gonna be a bridesmaid, but you're never gonna be a bride!
author: Annie

quote: I'm not a hero, I'm just a guy who likes to eat.
author: Goku

quote: I am not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That is my nindo: my ninja way.
author: Naruto

quote: If you do not take risks, you can not create a future.
author: Monkey D.Luffy

quote: The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: It is not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
author: Bruce Wayne

quote: Nobody is gonna hit as hard as life, but it is how hard you can hit. It is how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
author: Rocky Balboa

quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you do not stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
author: Ferris Bueller
